snippet.title: Kryptoria - Built in Unity
snippet.description:
A new world has been built in Unity: Kryptoria. 

Where immersive gameplay meets innovative web3 tech. 🤝

Kryptoria is a blockchain-based online strategy game built using the Unity engine, which powers 50% of the world's games and 60% of the world's VR content. Players can Build, Trade and Fight their way to glory - each Alpha Citizen NFT will grant holders free additional land and weapon NFTs, dropping in September 2022. Carve your empire into the Unity-built world of Kryptoria - game launching late 2022.
